body:
Patch is from https://gitlab.cern.ch/hepmc/HepMC3/-/commit/ba38f14d8f56c16cc4105d98f6d4540c928c6150, which is included in upstream master and upstream releases as of hepmc3@3.2.2.

This ensure at least one version of hepmc3 compiles with gcc@9.3.0.
title: [hepmc3] gcc@9.3.0 patch for @3.1.2:3.2.1, conflicts for earlier @:3.1.1
